name: Crab Stack
description:
The mysterious crab billionaire, Pedals T. Crab, has offered to share some of his wealth with your crab gang. Press Z to jump. Catch the coins as they float past! Catch as many as you can!

Yellow Coins = 10 point, Red Coins = -50 point, Green Coins = 50 points

Created as part of Crab Zine, an art zine about crabs! Go check it out: https://gum.co/QYpiZ/crablife

Pico-8 Forum page: http://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=3100

The audio is crackling in non-firefox browsers. Follow the above link to play a version without this problem.
